movies.title: 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup
movies.plot: Biopic based on the life of author Raymond Roussel.
movies.simplePlot: Biopic based on the life of author Raymond Roussel.

biography.bio: Jane Birkin was born on December 14, 1946 in London, England as Jane Mallory Birkin. She is an actress, known for Death on the Nile (1978), Blow-Up (1966) and La belle noiseuse (1991). She was previously married to John Barry.
biography.name: Jane Birkin

biography.bio: Sergio Castellitto was born in Rome in 1953. After graduating from the Silvio D'Amico National Academy of Dramatic Art in 1978, he began his theatrical career in Italian public theater with "Shakespeare's Measure for Measure" at the Teatro di Roma and with roles in other plays such as "La Madre by Brecht", "Merchant of Venice", and "Candelaio" by Giordano Bruno. At the Teatro di Genova he starred in the roles of Tuzenbach in "Chekhov's Three Sisters" and "Jean in Strindberg's Miss Julie", both under the direction of Otomar Krejka. In the coming years, he also starred in such theatrical productions as "L'infelicità senza desideri" and "Piccoli equivoci" at the Festival dei Due Mondi in Spoleto. He also appeared in "Barefoot in the Park" by Neil Simon. During his years in the theatre, he worked alongside many famous actors, including Luigi Squarzina, Aldo Trionfo, and Enzo Muzii. Castellitto began his film career in 1983 beside Marcello Mastroianni and Michel Piccoli in "The General of the Dead Army" by Luciano Tovoli. He interpreted many films like "Sembra morto...ma è solo svenuto" directed by Felice Farina, "Piccoli equivoci" by Ricky Tognazzi and "Stasera a casa di Alice" by Carlo Verdone. He became more famous with the films "The Great Pumpkin" by Francesca Archibugi and "The Star Maker" by Giuseppe Tornatore. In the late 1980s, Castellitto appeared in several Italian television miniseries, including "Un siciliano in Sicilia" (1987), "Cinque storie inquietanti" (1987), "Piazza Navona" (1988), "Cinéma" (1988), and "Come stanno bene insieme" (1989). He also appeared in the miniseries "Victoire, ou la douleur des femmes" (2000). Success arrived with the films "La famiglia", "L'ultimo bacio", "Caterina in the Big City", "My Mother's Smile", "Mostly Martha", and especially with "Don't Move", written by his wife Margaret Mazzantini. Other films that he interpreted include "Il regista di matrimoni" by Marco Bellocchio and La stella che non c'è by Gianni Amelio. In France Castellitto played the male lead opposite Jeanne Balibar in Jacques Rivette's Va savoir (2001). His most recent accomplishment as actor has been in his role as "Padre Pio: Miracle Man", arguably the defining role of his career. The first film that he directed is "Libero Burro", followed by "Don't Move". He played the role of the antagonist, King Miraz, in the film "The Chronicles of Narnia: Prince Caspian". His most recent film as director was "Twice Born", which played at the Toronto Film Festival (2012), where it was not well received by much of the English speaking press. Most recently, Castellitto appeared in the television series "In Treatment" in the role of Giovanni. Castellitto is married to Margaret Mazzantini with four children.
biography.name: Sergio Castellitto

biography.bio: André Marcon was born on July 6, 1948. He is an actor, known for L'avenir (2016), Les garçons et Guillaume, à table! (2013) and Marguerite (2015).
biography.name: André Marcon

biography.bio: Jacques Bonnaffé was born on June 22, 1958 in Douai, Nord, France. He is an actor, known for First Name: Carmen (1983), Venus Beauty (1999) and La tourneuse de pages (2006).
biography.name: Jacques Bonnaffé

biography.bio: Julie-Marie Parmentier was born on June 13, 1981 in Saint-Quentin, Aisne, France. She is an actress, known for Évolution (2015), Murderous Maids (2000) and Farewell, My Queen (2012).
biography.name: Julie-Marie Parmentier

biography.bio: Hélène de Vallombreuse is an actress, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009) and Le plus grand cabaret du monde (1998).
biography.name: Hélène de Vallombreuse

biography.bio: Tintin Orsoni is an actor, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009).
biography.name: Tintin Orsoni

biography.bio: Vimala Pons was born on March 15, 1986 in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, India. She is an actress, known for Elle (2016), La fille du 14 juillet (2013) and Eden Log (2007).
biography.name: Vimala Pons

biography.bio: Mikaël Gaspar is an actor, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009) and Le sanglot des anges (2008).
biography.name: Mikaël Gaspar

biography.bio: Stéphane Laisné is an actor, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009) and Arrêt spectacles (2003).
biography.name: Stéphane Laisné

biography.bio: Dominique D'Angelo is an actor, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009).
biography.name: Dominique D'Angelo

biography.bio: Hélène De Bissy is an actress, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009) and Accouchement sonique (2010).
biography.name: Hélène De Bissy

biography.bio: Pierre Barayre is an actor, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009).
biography.name: Pierre Barayre

biography.bio: Marie-Paule André is an actress, known for 36 vues du Pic Saint Loup (2009), Judith Therpauve (1978) and Natalia (1988).
biography.name: Marie-Paule André

biography.bio: Julie-Anne Roth is an actress and director, known for La fiancée syrienne (2004), Le péril jeune (1994) and The Messenger: The Story of Joan of Arc (1999).
biography.name: Julie-Anne Roth
